name: Kings and Pigs (Chundot)
description:
A very simple platformer game.

  • Movement: ← / → ;
  • Jump: Space / Z ;
  • Attack: X;
  • Pause: Esc / P.

This game is still updating.

For game engine, I use Godot Mono 3.4.2.

Credit:

  • Kings and pigs assets: https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/kings-and-pigs
  • Bitmap font out of the box: https://emhuo.itch.io/nico-pixel-fonts-pack
  • Sfx from bundles: https://kenney.itch.io/

The source: https://github.com/chundot/kings-and-pigs
